games.title: The Never Ending Obby!
games.description: An obby game featuring endlessly and randomly generated stages, ensuring a unique experience each time players join. One of my first games to ever come out.

games.title: Build Battle: Alpha
games.description: A competitive building game where players are tasked with constructing themed builds within a time limit, followed by a voting phase to determine the best creation.

games.title: The Graveyard: Beta
games.description: An immersive experience set in a mysterious graveyard, challenging players to explore and uncover hidden secrets.

games.title: Ice Cream Tycoon
games.description: A tycoon game where players build and manage their own ice cream business, striving to expand and dominate the market.

games.title: Business Empire Tycoon
games.description: Players start from scratch to build a vast business empire, making strategic decisions to outmaneuver competitors and maximize profits.

games.title: Social Hangout
games.description: A social platform designed for players to meet, chat, and engage in various mini-games, fostering a vibrant community atmosphere.
